page.title: 02Swardeston
page.content: There are 481 people over 18 who live in Swardeston and at least 150 younger which gives the village an average population of 630. 50% of the village population were born in the village wwhilst the other 50% are newccomers. 33% of the population are under 20, 33% are aged 20_55, while the other 33% are over 55. Most of the villagers work in Norwich whilst some work on the farms and on ther nursery in Swardeston. There are many activities that go on in the village such as bowls, cricket, social, tennis and youth clubs, morris dancing, ladies' guild and chgurch activities. There are a few industrial plants ssuch as Bryer Chemicals, an abattoir, Norwich Steel Enterprise Plant and bakery. Edith Cavell was born here.
